meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the June 26, 2024 City Council Meeting
An ordinance amending Sections 2-43, 2-44, and 2-49 of Chapter 2, 'Administration'
agenda_items.description: Changing the name of the Department of Building Services to Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32554
agenda_items.description: Authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2023-24.

agenda_items.title: Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Patricia Ann Dunagan-Baylor A/N/F minor K.G. v. City of Dallas
Authorize payment of the property damage claims filed by Daniel Gowan and Travelers Insurance
Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Spencer Fane LLP
A resolution approving notes issued pursuant to a commercial paper program
agenda_items.description: To finance improvements at Dallas Love Field.

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the execution of the Financing Agreement
agenda_items.description: For the funding commitment from the Texas Water Development Board.

agenda_items.title: A resolution amending the Code of Rules and Regulations of the Civil Service Board
